<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Ensure that pre-exisiting modules are still working as before the update. Sets available in field to advanced reservation and max occurrences to 180 if these fields are empty.</description>
        <name>Repair reservable modules</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[repairReservableModules();

/**
 * Function to ensure reservable modules are still working as they did before update.
 * Update to available_in needed as previously modules would always be available now it needs to be configured.
 * Update to max_occurrences needed as this field is now mandatory.
 * Only updates fields if empty.
 */
function repairReservableModules() {
	var moduleGr = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_rsv_reservable_module');
	moduleGr.query();

	while(moduleGr.next()){
		if(moduleGr.available_in.nil())
			moduleGr.setValue('available_in', 'advanced_reservation');

		if(moduleGr.max_occurrences.nil())
			moduleGr.setValue('max_occurrences', WSDConstants.RESERVABLE_MODULE_DEFAULT_VALUES.max_occurrences);

		moduleGr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
